name: Tuks Senganga
description: '''Tumelo Kepadisa''' (born 2 May 1981), better known as '''Tuks Senganga''', is a South African [[motswako]] rapper born in [[Mafikeng]], in the former homeland of the [[Bophuthatswana]]. He frequently performs in indigenous African languages, mostly [[Setswana]]. Tuks Senganga started writing in 1993, drawing inspiration from everyday issues in his immediate environment. His career took off in 2005 with his first album ''[[Mafoko A Me]]''. This was the album that earned him the Best Hip Hop Album Award at the 12th Annual MTN [[South African Music Awards]] (SAMA).
